name: Darklancer VR - Corporate Mercenary
description:
In a distant future you are a Darklancer - A corporate mercenary who takes contracts on the dark web to do the dirty work of megacorps.

This is a prototype. The game is developed for VR and utilizes SteamVR to run. There is only one mission. I want to see how much interest this prototype generates to decide if I want to develop the game further.
